kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=mysession, url=https://reqres.in, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=True, debug=0

test.name: Do get request and validate data

kw.name: Get On Session
kw.doc: Sends a GET request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: GET Request : url=https://reqres.in/api/users path_url=/api/users headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.28.2', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} body=None

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.doc: Fails if response status code is different than the expected.
